instructions: Go to My T-Mobile and click SIGN UP . Enter your information and click Sign me up . Email verification steps: 6-digit verification code sent to your email address given during activation. Alternatively, you can send the code to a different email address. Phone verification steps: 6-digit verification code sent to your mobile number. Selecting Send to a different number will register the number the code is sent to and not the number that started the registration process. Account PIN verification steps: Use the account PIN/Passcode set up during activation. If you skip this step on a prepaid account, you won't have access to your account. Click Next , then follow the on-screen steps to complete the registration.
